summary: Changes Main Menu to Civil War Themed
descriptionHtml:
Ladies and Gentlemen, I gave you the mod that made Immersive Menu Background famouse! Civil War Themed Main Menu. Sadly this mod never made it to the top page. This is a basic mod that changes the background of Skyrim to an after battle of Skyrim\'s civil war background. 

[youtube]_8ouIXoxSa7I[/youtube]

Install:
Click Install NMM
or
Drop files into data folder in your installation directory.

Recommended mod:
Intro Music Replacement by Malukah
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2101

Required mods: none

Bugs: none
author: oomnine
